description: Moving with speed, agility and confidence on technical terrain is a unique, exhilarating freedom. Light and fast, the leather Konseal FL 2 is nimble, sure-footed, and artfully balances stiffness and flex. Its Vibram® Megagrip outsole provides a secure hold - wet or dry, and a midfoot chassis and raised sidewalls add stability and protection. The breathable split-suede upper improves durability, and the minimalist design delivers a distinctive look that moves easily from trail to town.
name: Arcteryx Konseal FL 2 Leather - Mens
